articles.title: Samsung Elec chip output at S.Korea plant partly halted due to short blackout
articles.description: Samsung Electronics partly halted some semiconductor production at its Hwaseong chip complex in South Korea after about a minute-long blackout on Tuesday afternoon, the company said on Wednesday.
articles.content:
SEOUL, Jan 1 (Reuters) - Samsung Electronics partly halted some semiconductor production at its Hwaseong chip complex in South Korea after about a minute-long blackout on Tuesday afternoon, the company said on Wednesday.

articles.title: Tennis-Canada's Shapovalov calls for merger of ATP Cup and Davis Cup
articles.description: Canadian Denis Shapovalov called on the organisers of the Davis Cup Finals and the ATP Cup to work together to create one world championship, saying it felt "weird" to play two similar events back to back.
articles.content:

articles.title: Tiger ends 2019 ranked No. 6
articles.description: Tiger Woods finished 2019 at No. 6 in the official world golf rankings, his highest year-end ranking since completing 2013 at No. 1.
articles.content:

articles.title: Global Markets: Stocks end 2019 near record highs, dollar slides

articles.title: China's largest potash producer fails in fifth bid to raise funds
articles.description: China state-owned Qinghai Salt Lake Potash Co, the country's largest potash producer, failed to sell its assets in a fifth round of auctions on Wednesday aimed at raising funds and avoid being delisted from the Shenzhen Stock Exchange.

articles.title: Trump says happy to have a trial in the Senate, but he does not really care
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday he would be happy to have a trial in the U.S. Senate following his impeachment by the Democratic-led House of Representatives, but that he did not really care.
articles.content:
